docs: Initialize a Test NFT with level 1 in attributes, plus some more info to match current EMR NFTs.
This will make an NFT similar to the current EMR NFTs.
endpoints.name: initialize

docs: Allows a user to deposit an NFT into the contract.
endpoints.name: depositNft

docs: Allows a user to iniate the retrieval of an NFT.
endpoints.name: retrieveNft

docs: Allows a user to claim their NFT after the unbonding period.
endpoints.name: claimNft

docs: Upgrade an NFT to the same level but with the new attributes.
endpoints.name: upgradeNft

docs: Increase the level of an NFT by 1.
endpoints.name: increaseLevel

docs: Decrease the level of an NFT by 1.
endpoints.name: decreaseLevel

docs: Boolean is a number -> 01 True , {empty}/"" False
endpoints.name: getRemainingUnbondingTime

docs: Returns:
- User Active NFT (Identifier, Nonce , Level)
- User in Retrieve NFT (Identifier, Nonce, Level)
- Unbounding Time
- Can Claim
endpoints.name: getUserInfo

docs: Returns:
- User Address
- Is in Retrieve
- Unbounding Time
Takes as input the token identifier and nonce of the NFT.
endpoints.name: getCustomNftInfo

docs: Returns all NFTs that are currently deposited in the smart contract.
This includes both the investors' NFTs and the regular NFTs.
It returns a list of tuples containing:
- Token Identifier
- Token Nonce
- Owner Address
endpoints.name: getAllNfts
